Microservice url components, with specific endpoint path.
A method for making calls to the edge microservice endpoints, featuring automatic model decoding, error handling based on the specified type, and a request handler.
is the template from which the
is a light-weight service running on the user’s device, providing RESTful API to the application environment.
Base path of a deployed edge
Convenience method for making data streaming calls to the edge microservice endpoints. Features a stream handler providing the data, a request handler for managing the call itself and error handling.
A method for making multipart data upload calls to the edge microservice endpoints, featuring automatic model decoding, error handling based on the specified type, and a request handler.
Microservice url components, without endpoint path.
A method for making calls to the edge microservice endpoints, with built-in automatic error handling and a request handler.

Convenience method for making data streaming calls to the edge microservice endpoints. Features a stream handler providing the data with automatic model decoding, a request handler for managing the call itself and error handling.

Convenience method for making Server-sent events (SSE) streaming calls to the edge microservice endpoints. Features a stream handler providing the SSE data, a request handler for managing the call itself and error handling.
A method for making multipart data upload calls to the edge microservice endpoints, featuring built-in automatic error handling, and a request handler.
